# ts-gems

[![NPM Version][npm-image]][npm-url]
[![NPM Downloads][downloads-image]][downloads-url]
[![CI Tests][ci-test-image]][ci-test-url]

## Installation

```bash
$ npm install ts-gems --save
```
## Node Compatibility
- node >= 16.x

ts-gems is available under [MIT](LICENSE) license.
